alert.note: Alert for Coastal Camden; Inland Camden; Northeastern Charlton; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 3:59PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Nassau, northwestern Duval, southwestern Camden and southeastern Charlton Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 358 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Folkston to near Bryceville. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Kingsland, Hilliard, Callahan, Jacksonville International Arpt, Kings Ferry, Cisco Gardens, St. George, Bryceville and Nassau Village-Ratliff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Camden; Inland Camden; Northeastern Charlton; Western Charlton
